nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_541_0
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: Her voice was beginning to tremble and she tried to control it but in vain.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_542_0
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: Jennifer was late for class the other day as a result of the heavy snow.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_543_0
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: The small company is now confronted with intense competition for the market share.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_544_0
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: In wintertime, food was hard to come by, so many animals died of hunger.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_545_0
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: Tom decided to follow his father's advice and apply for a job in the bank, as he liked working with numbers.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_546_0
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: I'm sorry I forgot his birthday: The date just completely slipped my mind.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_547_0
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: In the end our choices came down to going or staying.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_548_0
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: The old man had a stroke, which condemned him to bed in the hospital for about half a year.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_549_0
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: My French was so poor at that time that I often had trouble making myself understood.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_550_0
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: If you have some one on your mind, let her know. Chances are you are on hers as well.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_551_0

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_552_0
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: None of their plans worked and Barbara and Ted decided to let life takes its course.
